name: Network Rail Infrastructure Limited
goal: Network Rail runs, maintains and develops Britain's rail tracks, signalling, bridges, tunnels, level crossings and many key stations.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Environment, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
- European railway standards & legislation
- 4th Railway Package
- Relevant implementing acts
- CEF
- TEN-T
- European Rail Freight Corridors
- Rail statistic
- Rail passenger rights
